name: Rhythm DeepDive
description:
Rhythm DeepDive is an auto-generated rhythm game.
Dodge or destroy the aeroliths on the beat, and you earn ammo power while dodging successfully.
Note: The game is still in development, only training mode is playable now.

How to Play

Spaceship Control:  W/A/S/D
Fire: Left Mouse Button
Shield: Right Mouse Button
Pause Game: Space

Credits

Game Designer / Programming / Art: Ruxuan Xu (Norza)
Music: Twisterium
